title: Bitcoin Business Categories
subtitle: Browse {count} categories and over {subcategoryCount} types of businesses that accept Bitcoin payments worldwide.

search.noResultsDescription: No categories match "{query}". Try a different search term.

seoParagraph: Mapping Bitcoin organizes Bitcoin-accepting businesses into {count} main categories with over {subcategoryCount} specific business types. Whether you're looking for restaurants, hotels, retail stores, or professional services that accept Bitcoin, our comprehensive directory helps you find exactly what you need.
